ul.li: Facilitate deployment to production
Fix JUnits after update to latest TTOM model 3_12
Fix FAT compilation errors
Estimate effort for failing FAT tests
Up to date JUnits with preparation for newest model
Fix FAT tests
Merge all work related to TTOM model 3_12 into mainline
Coredb code updated to TTOM:3_12 and ready to work for other teams
Get rid of SQL query that runs as postprocess on Postgres database
Move that process to CSV-Creator - java tool

slide.ul:
Successfully loaded all California datasets (UC1-UC6)
Time to: create CSVs + LoadMDS decreased to 44% of original time
Detailed performance results available below: http://vos.intra.local/display/CPEQAE/Optimize+MDS+load+time+%28move+arJson+step+to+CSVCreator%29

ul.li:
Align values for all attributes using:
Side of Line
Ended
Validity Direction

Reduced the number of attributes:
Direction Of Traffic Flow, Vehicle Restriction, Special Charge and Construction Status --> Validity Direction

Easy use of these attributes:
Side of Line and Position Attributes all have the same values
Blocked Passage, Transition and Lane End all have the same values

header.h3: TIF POI's relationships - Anchor Point Stable Id

ul.li: Reintroduce Anchor Point Stable Id
Link between a POI and APT Point
Stable identifier for a POI

header.h3: Model update: Name updated in Address Points

ul.li: Bring APT model in line with new Name model
Modified Multinet Address Points 1.8 specification brought to Tif2TTOM
Language is integrated into Composite Address Component Set
Address Scheme ID is deduced from Address Component Types present in the data
Bring DDCT API closer to model
American English
Easier to understand API
Easier to use API
Enabler for other teams to continue developing
Enabler to take the number of failing fat tests into account in the planning of next sprint
Multi LineString Road Element in CPP 3.8 RMC data (SP3)
Split big features query into subqueries (SP1)
RoadElement.CompositeDirectionOfTrafficFlowForLane value "_INVALID_" (SP2)
Make sure that tile crossing associations go from source to target & vice versa (SP3)
Make Place Names repetitive to store multiple Place Names (SP1)
Constraints issues for POI's/APT's outside of dataset (SP3)
(3.8 RMC): "No valid country information retrieved in YardScopeProvider" on AE3 Dataset. (SP3)
Create ID tables at dataset level i.s.o. PAL level (SP1)
